articles.description: U19 World Cup: As the Indian cricketers charged inside the ground, screaming, the South Africa cricketers were distraught, some even had tears in their eyes. | Cricket
articles.content: It was a familiar sight on the cricket field in Benoni on Tuesday. Indian players dashing onto the field after punching their ticket on yet another ICC U19 World Cup final - a record-extending fifth … [+5145 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: South Africa fight to avoid first Test defeat in New Zealand - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The weakened South Africans toiled for 28 overs before lunch on Day 4, with Zubayr Hamza (31) at the crease with Raynard van Tonder (26) - one of six debutants. | Cricket
articles.content:
South Africa made a dreadful start but dug in at 62-2 on Wednesday as they fought to avoid defeat against hosts New Zealand in the first Test.
